summary:
About Me:
Passionate about driving success in the B2B market segment, I am a results-oriented Sales Director with a proven track record of leading high-impact growth initiatives. With over 7 years of experience in strategic account management and new business development, I thrive in building lasting client relationships while delivering measurable revenue excellence.

Key Skills & Expertise:
🛠️Strategic Account Management: Nurturing and expanding key accounts, consistently exceeding client expectations by offering tailored solutions.
🛠️New Business Development: Recognizing growth opportunities and driving new business initiatives to achieve revenue goals.
🛠️Negotiation Guru: Skilled negotiator, adept at securing profitable deals and fostering mutually beneficial partnerships.
🛠️Client Relationship Builder: Building strong rapport with clients, earning trust as a trusted advisor and problem solver.
🛠️Market Penetration Specialist: Developing effective strategies to penetrate new markets and drive market share expansion.
🛠️Revenue Optimization Champion: Leveraging data-driven insights to optimize sales performance and revenue generation.
🛠️Consultative Selling Pro: Adopting a consultative approach to selling, understanding customer needs to provide personalized solutions.
🛠️Cross-Functional Team Leader: Collaborating seamlessly with diverse teams to ensure streamlined sales processes and exceptional customer experiences.
🛠️Data-Driven Sales Strategist: Utilizing KPI metrics to inform strategies and make data-backed decisions.
🛠️Global Market Expansion Enthusiast: Successfully navigating international markets, embracing cultural diversity, and fostering global growth.

🎯My Vision:
As an outside-the-box-thinking sales leader, I believe in pushing the boundaries of success in the aviation industry. I am dedicated to spearheading innovative sales strategies, unlocking new revenue streams, and consistently delivering value to clients and stakeholders alike.

profile_positions.description:
Company introduction

The National Aerospace Group (NAG) is the trade association for national and international organisations established in the Netherlands and active in aerospace & airport development. The NAG has more than 100 members who together represent 95% of the Dutch Aviation industry’s revenue. Their mission is to continuously optimise the Dutch Aviation industry’s ability to compete internationally. 

To realise this collective ambition worldwide, the NAG supports this sector through the development of expert knowledge, advocacy, access to the national and international market, and an extensive network. With members in Airport Development & Infrastructure, Aircraft Manufacturing and Aircraft Maintenance, the organisation operates within the whole Aviation transport system.

Job responsibilities

•	Create a survey template to gather data from the associated members within the four segments of the Aviation industry.
•	Retrieve information from NAG’s data sources.
•	Manage a grant base research and submitting the gathered data in a new data base.
•	Analyse the received information from associated members & data base to explore upcoming trends within the Aviation industry.
•	Write a report for the NAG in which the upcoming trends and implementations are being displayed.
•	Evaluate on the report with the upper level of the organisation.
•	Deliver PowerPoints & poster presentation to the NAG and their associated members to share thoughts and discuss future insights.
profile_positions.title: Research Internship
